message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
Hi Bob, I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $125. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $110?
Hi Bob, I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer you the product for $122. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $115?
Hi Bob, I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $118. It's my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $117?

Hi Bob, I'm not willing to go any lower than my previous offer. I'm afraid I'll have to say no to $117. I'm willing to sell the product to John for $120, so I think it's time for me to consider other options.
